Sentencas: A new type of anode, a Ni framework coated with Sm-doped ceria (SDC), was developed for direct utilization of methane fuel in low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with thin-film SDC electrolytes.
Titulo: Ceria coated Ni as anodes for direct utilization of methane in low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The coated SDC was prepared with an ion impregnating method and the electrolyte films were fabricated with a co-pressing and co-firing technique.
Titulo: Ceria coated Ni as anodes for direct utilization of methane in low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The impregnating process produced an ideal anode microstructure where nickel particles were effectively connected and uniformly covered with nanosized SDC.
Titulo: Ceria coated Ni as anodes for direct utilization of methane in low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This anode microstructure was believed to enlarge the triple-phase boundaries and therefore enhance the anode performance.
Titulo: Ceria coated Ni as anodes for direct utilization of methane in low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cell performance was much higher than that of a conventional fuel cell with a Ni-SDC composite anode.
Titulo: Ceria coated Ni as anodes for direct utilization of methane in low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, the performance increased with impregnated SDC loading up to a maximum at 20 mg cm(-2), indicating that the coated SDC is the contributing factor for the enhanced fuel cell performance.
Titulo: Ceria coated Ni as anodes for direct utilization of methane in low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Power density as high as 571 and 353 MW cm(-2) were obtained at 600 degrees C when humidified hydrogen and methane were used as fuels, respectively.
Titulo: Ceria coated Ni as anodes for direct utilization of methane in low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The stability of the cell also increased with the SDC loading.
Titulo: Ceria coated Ni as anodes for direct utilization of methane in low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: No significant degradation was observed for anodes coated with 20 and 25 mg cm(-2) SDC.
Titulo: Ceria coated Ni as anodes for direct utilization of methane in low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This verifies that the coated SDC electrodes are very effective in suppressing catalytic carbon formation by blocking methane from approaching the Ni, which is catalytically active towards methane pyrolysis.
Titulo: Ceria coated Ni as anodes for direct utilization of methane in low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The high performance of this anode shows high promise in the developing field of direct hydrocarbon SOFCs.
Titulo: Ceria coated Ni as anodes for direct utilization of methane in low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
